readable.title: 44856031_0d82c2c7d1
readable.content: A brown dog is sprayed with water . A dog is being squirted with water in the face outdoors . A dog stands on his hind feet and catches a stream of water . A jug is jumping up it is being squirted with a jet of water . A tan , male dog is jumping up to get a drink of water from a spraying bottle .
